text: Blue Tunnel Project, is an effort to provide large-scale irrigation to arid lands of Konya Plain, in the Turkish heartland, where agriculture and wildlife are under threat.Turkey's arid heart to bloom after irrigation projectBlue Tunnel to connect Konya Plain with potable water Blue Tunnel, the most important part of the Konya Plain Project, is the second-largest irrigation scheme of Turkey after the Southeastern Anatolia Project (GAP),Second-largest irrigation project opens in Central Anatolia and aims to provide the region with a yearly 414 million cubic meters of water. ==References== Category:Economy of Turkey
title: Blue Tunnel Project
